com.pump.plaf

Class NavigationPanelUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.SpinnerUI
        • javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicSpinnerUI
          • com.pump.plaf.NavigationPanelUI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompactNavigationPanelUI, LargeNavigationPanelUI

    public abstract class NavigationPanelUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicSpinnerUI
    This is the abstract parent class for JSpinners intended to navigate a collection of objects/properties.

    The following code will automatically format your panel to include a label that reads "Page 5 of 10" or "Image 1 of 2", etc: 

    mySpinner.putClientProperty( 
                NavigationPanelUI.PROPERTY_DESCRIPTOR, 
                new NumberSpinnerDescriptor(mySpinner, "Page"));

      • createLabel

      • isDraggable

        protected boolean isDraggable(javax.swing.JSpinner spinner)

      • refreshLabel

        public void refreshLabel(javax.swing.JSpinner spinner,
                         javax.swing.JLabel label)
        Refresh a label to describe the contents of a spinner. The consults the PROPERTY_DESCRIPTOR client property for the spinner, and if it is defined then it is used to format the label text. If that property is not defined, then the label is basically set to spinner.getValue().toString().
        Parameters:
        spinner - the spinner to consult.
        label - the label to update.
